product_name: ECOXGEAR EcoXpro Waterproof Speaker Smartphone Case - Special Buy
long_description: This waterproof Smartphone case has a built-in 3-in. full-range speaker and an external waterproof headset jack so you can take your jams with you anytime, anyplace, anywhere.
